titles.title: Reduce Unemployment for Veterans of All Ages Act of 2020
Reduce Unemployment for Veterans of All Ages Act of 2020

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to eliminate the period of eligibility for the Vocational Rehabilitation and Employment program of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Reduce Unemployment for Veterans of All Ages Act of 2020
This bill eliminates the 12-year eligibility limitation on Department of Veterans Affairs training or vocational rehabilitation benefits for veterans with a service-connected disability.
